labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.expected_result: Client displays the little mute thing by your name in the voice channel
data.short_description: Push to Mute keybind doesn't show the mute indicator clientside
data.steps_to_repro: - Have Push to Mute as a keybind (Settings, Keybinds, Push to Mute) - Use your new Push to Mute keybind
